Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking through one of the more peaceful sections of town.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road, you can see the large Bushman Farms estate where various fruit trees of nearly every variety grow in plenty. The peace and quiet of the road is only interrupted by the occassional shouts of encouragement from the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, located to the west.
